Fraps has a trial, and is usually the most recommended one.

There was another thread somewhere you could take a look at I think.

Here we go:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=10576.0

Hope this helps.

Fraps.

And, most people record their commentary after they made the game. You can record your gameplay with fraps and your voice with, for example, the recording function of your phone. You can add the voice easily with with Windows Movie Maker.

I don\'t think that people record after playing, at least not in Lets Plays.

my brother uses Video debut studio or so and it\'s completely free.
